In England, in the seven days to 20 July, there were 299,512 new confirmed cases (532.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 13 July, there were 224,620 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 33% (74,892 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 25 July is 4,972,040 (8,833.4 cases per 100,000 population).
